Hi, im using an fujitsu siemens amilo pro and i need software for my harddrive that can fix my problem. My problem is: When i tried to install windows xp it comed upp that it cant find any harddrive, plzz help me
if the BIOS cant see the hard drive its possibaly a Hardware issue... if its all partitioned for linxu partitons - then windows may be ignoreing the partitions.
if so  - repartiion the drive how you need it to be.
